import React from 'react'; import ReactDOM from 'react-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; import './sidebar.css'; const URL = process.env.REACT_APP_LOCAL; class Side extends React.Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { specification : [], } this.fetchSpecification = this.fetchSpecification.bind(this) } componentWillMount(){ this.fetchSpecification(); } fetchSpecification(){ axios.post(URL+'/api/user/fetchSpecification',{ subCategoryId : "5d7215b1c86f411656184ccd" }).then((response)=>{ console.log('this.sidebar',response.data.doc) this.setState({ specification : response.data.doc }) }) } render(){ console.log('specification',this.state.specification); return(
